resources.string: Manage your Camera on a system level

Welcome to Camera Manager Settings.\n This configuration screen will allow you to manage access to the cameras.\n Please mind, that the settings will only be applied on those apps, which this module has been activated for and that a restart may be necessary to apply changes.
Disables Camera Manager completely for all selected apps. \ Those apps will not have access to any camera anymore.
Hide Cameras by removing them from the list of available cameras when the app requests one.

Block access to this camera when the app attempts to open it. An app will usually not try to access cameras it does not know about, so hiding a camera should be enough. You can still use this for additional security, but it\'s not recommended to block access without hiding the cameras.
